CustomField.description: Link for customers to verify microdeposits if they paid ACH with microdeposits. Only exists if ACH was used and microdeposits selected for verification
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Link for customers to verify microdeposits if they paid ACH with microdeposits. Only exists if ACH was used and microdeposits selected for verification
CustomField.label: Stripe Microdeposit Verification Link
